# MTLDataType.rg16Snorm

**Case**

An ordinary pixel with two components, each of which is a 16-bit, normalized, signed integer value.

## Declaration

```swift
case rg16Snorm
```

## Discussion

The color components are in RG order, which stands for red and green.

## 32-bit pixel format types

- **MTLDataType.rgba8Snorm**: An ordinary pixel with four components, each of which is an 8-bit, normalized, signed integer value.
- **MTLDataType.rgba8Unorm**: An ordinary pixel with four components, each of which is an 8-bit, normalized, unsigned integer value.
- **MTLDataType.rgba8Unorm_srgb**: An ordinary pixel with four components, each of which is an 8-bit, normalized, unsigned integer value in the sRGB color space.
- **MTLDataType.rg16Unorm**: An ordinary pixel with two components, each of which is a 16-bit, normalized, unsigned integer value.
- **MTLDataType.rgb10a2Unorm**: A packed 32-bit format with three color components, each of which is a 10-bit, normalized, unsigned integer value.
- **MTLDataType.rgb9e5Float**: A packed 32-bit format with three color components, each of which is a 9-bit floating-point value.
- **MTLDataType.rg11b10Float**: A packed 32-bit format with three floating-point color components, two of which are 11-bit values, and one is a 10-bit value.
